sentences.en: AIDS stands for Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome.
sentences.cn: AIDS是获得性免疫缺损综合征的缩写。

sentences.en: Broad beans are very much an acquired taste.
sentences.cn: 要慢慢适应才能吃得惯蚕豆。

sentences.en: Everton paraded their recently acquired silverware.
sentences.cn: 埃弗顿展示了他们最近获得的银杯。

sentences.en: General Motors acquired a 50% stake in Saab for about $400m.
sentences.cn: 通用汽车公司以大约4亿美元的价格购得了萨博汽车公司50%的股份。

sentences.en: Had he succeeded, he would have acquired a monopoly.
sentences.cn: 要是他当时成功了，他就会取得垄断地位。

sentences.en: He acquired the craft of wood carving in his native town.
sentences.cn: 他在老家学会了木雕手艺.

sentences.en: He has acquired a reputation as this country's premier solo violinist.
sentences.cn: 他已经赢得了该国首席小提琴独奏家的名誉。

sentences.en: I acquired lasting respect for tradition and veneration for the past.
sentences.cn: 我开始对传统和历史产生了持久的敬慕.

sentences.en: I must have acquired ambivalent attitude towards women from her.
sentences.cn: 我对妇女的矛盾态度一定是从她那里学来的.

sentences.en: Living alone is an acquired taste.
sentences.cn: 独处是一种修得的境界。

sentences.en: She has acquired a good knowledge of English.
She was sitting in her newly-acquired wheelchair.
sentences.cn: 她正坐在新买的轮椅上。

sentences.en: The company has recently acquired new offices in central London.
sentences.cn: 公司最近在伦敦市中心弄到了新的办公室.

sentences.en: Use the transferable skills acquired from your previous working background.
sentences.cn: 先前工作中学到的技能能为现在所用的就多加利用。

sentences.en: William has acquired an unshakeable belief in himself.
sentences.cn: 威廉对自己有绝对的信心。

words.tran_cn: [生物][医]后天的；[遗]已获得的；已成习惯的

phrases.tran_cn: 艾滋病；获得性免疫缺陷综合症
获得性免疫缺陷综合症；爱滋病
获得性耐药；获得抗病性

trans.tran_cn: （尤指靠自己的努力或行动）获得的，习得的，<医>后天的，起初不喜欢但后来逐渐培养的爱好
获得( acquire的过去式和过去分词 )，（使用探测器）捕获（目标），取得，（计算机、机器人等）捕捉
trans.tran_en: If you acquire something, you buy or obtain it for yourself, or someone gives it to you
